verbose_text: Collagen hydrolysates have gained huge public attention initially due to an in vitro study published by Oesser et al. XREF_BIBR, in which collagen type I hydrolysates were found to stimulate the synthesis of proteoglycans and collagen using cultured healthy bovine articular chondrocytes XREF_BIBR.
evidence: collagen type I hydrolysates were found to stimulate the synthesis of proteoglycans and collagen
